snippet: LEAD: WHEN it comes to science and technology, California has long been blessed - from the founding of Berkeley, Caltech and Stanford in the late 1800's, to the aerospace boom during and after World War II, to the rise of Silicon Valley....
lead_paragraph: LEAD: WHEN it comes to science and technology, California has long been blessed - from the founding of Berkeley, Caltech and Stanford in the late 1800's, to the aerospace boom during and after World War II, to the rise of Silicon Valley.

headline.main: IDEAS & TRENDS: The Fight for Federal Funds; California Is Losing Its High-Tech Edge
